issue.title: [CF 532] ALERT: TellMeWhen completely busted on live
issue.body:
http://i.imgur.com/ZZ4dD.jpg

To note: There was a strange message in chat, you can still read it in the screenshot (though I get the same message with a different code on beta too). Also entering config mode does nothing. Happened as soon as I restarted WoW after installing r533. Went back to r532 and things are fine again. Beta is working fine too.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #532 | Raw

comments.body:
Perhaps you should make separate beta builds?


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

Too hard to manage when the main addon is also pushing major changes. I can't have MoP-only releases until MoP comes out in China.

In the mean time, it seems that this only happens upon first login with a character. So, if you log in and then reload, it works. I just have no idea why.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I was trying too hard to generate the defaults for group talent tree settings. The data needed isn't available till wayyyyy to late in the login process on live. It it available earlier in beta, which is why it works there. So, TMW was being initialized before these defaults were set, which basically disabled every group for every talent tree.

Edited Aug 15, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

The message in chat was just some debugging output that I forgot to delete.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
